description: You left a cookie on the table and bugs are eating it! Now it's time to get even... BUGS!!! is a fast-paced, simple and fun game. Just crush as many bugs as possible by tapping them. You score points by crushing the bugs. The bugs score points by reaching your cookie. You get more points for roaches and spiders, but beware: spiders can bite you! A game typically lasts a few minutes. No two games are the same. Your infestation level may vary. BUGS!!! is currently available exclusively for Palm webOS devices. This trial version is the same as the full version except that the game ends quickly (when the bugs get 50 points instead of 200).  It's also easier to win the game than in the full version because you need to reach only 50 points. BUGS!!! works best when no other apps are running. For smoothest gameplay, exit the App Catalog before launching BUGS!!!
